text: Isak Andic Ermay (1 October 1953 – 14 December 2024) was a Turkish-Spanish businessman. In 1984, he founded clothing retailer Mango. Andic was worth about US$4.5 billion at the time of his death, making him the richest person in Catalonia and one of the richest in Spain. Andic died in Collbató, Spain on 14 December 2024, at the age of 71, after falling to his death during a visit to a cave. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Turkish businesspeople Category:Spanish businesspeople Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:People from Istanbul Category:People from Catalonia
title: Isak Andic
